author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Recently the first CVE in the Linux kernel involved Rust code was marked, but what was this CVE, how did it happen it and was it that big of a deal.

Check out the podcast: https://techovertea.xyz/youtube
